verbose_text: VEGF receptor kinase inhibitors can suppress VEGF mediated BRB breakdown, but this strategy shows that TNFalpha, IL-1beta, and IGF-1 do not induce BRB leakage through an induction of VEGF, indicating that these mediators operate through distinct pathways that may also be targeted.
evidence: TNFalpha, IL-1beta, and IGF-1 do not induce BRB
